name: Redeemer
summary: REDEEMER is a intense Brawler where you will punch, hack and blast your way through enemies using fists, hammers, fire arms and even the environment.
info:
• 别名: Redeemer: Enhanced Edition
  • 别名: 救赎者
  • 别名: 救赎者：增强版
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: PS4
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 游戏类型: Beat 'em up, top-down shooter
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 2人
  • 发行日期: 2017-08-01
  • 官方网站: http://redeemerthegame.com/
  • 开发: Sobaka Studio
  • 发行: Good Shepherd Entertainment
